gui.filereader.main.title: TextFileReader main screen
gui.filereader.read.title: TextFileReader Reading Screen - Currently Reading: %s
gui.filereader.settings.title: TextFileReader Settings Screen
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.textfiler: A mod that can read out-of-game files in game
options.textfilereader.guiautoupdatefile: Automatically update file list in main GUI

Requesting a list of files from the server after the main GUI has been open for some time
may generate additional traffic!
options.textfilereader.removeinvalidfile:
When updating the permissions file, it checks for invalid files and removes the permissions from the file if the option is yes!
§4Doing so causes the file's permissions to be removed!
§4Especially if you are deleting and then copying new files!
options.textfilereader.segmentedoutput.t:
(client only)
(this is usually used for /FileReader Read or /cFileReader Read)
If the option is yes, the contents of the file will be output to the chat window in segments.
This will cause some of the file content to be grabbed by other output text before the rest of the file is output, resulting in intermittent output of the file.The output of the file will not look as good as it should
options.textfilereader.pausegame: pause the game when opening reading screen
options.textfilereader.pausegame.tooltop:
Pause the game while the TextFileReader reading screen is open
§eBut it doesn't pause while the TextFileReader main screen is open
options.textfilereader.readscreen.linesp: Lines in a page containing file
options.textfilereader.threads.tooltip:
(Restart Minecraft takes effect) Change the number of Text File Reader worker threads
§ePlease set carefully according to your CPU configuration!
§eToo high value may make Minecraft stuck
§eLow values will slow down the work of TextFileReader
